patthana10.3:2.1: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana10.3:4.1: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.3:5.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana10.3:6.1: Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
patthana10.3:7.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava.)
patthana10.3:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
